sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyxxgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from khdx_hy h where rtrim(t.hydh)=rtrim(h.hydh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyxxgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.hydh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyxxgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员名称输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.hymc)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyxxgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'手机号码输入错误，只能输入:11位整数,0位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.sjhm)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.sjhm,11,0)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyxxgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.yjdz)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyxxgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.wxh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyxxgldr_temp t set error=error||'行员代号和名称必须一致' where not exists ( select 1 from khdx_hy hy where t.hydh=hy.hydh and hy.hymc=t.hymc)
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyxxgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists( select 1 from MPAS_HYXX tar where 1=1 and t.hydh =tar.hydh )

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update hyxxgldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select hydh,yjdz from hyxxgldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by hydh,yjdz having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.hydh=dr.hydh and t.yjdz=dr.yjdz) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE hyxxgldr_temp ( hydh varchar(100) , hymc varchar(100) , sjhm varchar(100) , yjdz varchar(100) , wxh varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hyxxgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from hyxxgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, hydh,hymc,sjhm,yjdz,wxh,khdxdh,error from hyxxgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, hydh,hymc,sjhm,yjdz,wxh,khdxdh,error from hyxxgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, hydh,hymc,sjhm,yjdz,wxh,khdxdh,error from hyxxgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into MPAS_HYXX(HYDH,SJHM,YJDZ,WXH) select t.hydh ,cast (t.sjhm as CHAR(11)), t.yjdz , t.wxh from hyxxgldr_temp t where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null)
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from MPAS_HYXX tar where exists(select 1 from hyxxgldr_temp t where 1=1 and t.hydh=tar.HYDH and t.yjdz=tar.YJDZ and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
